posts.title: Folding Wayfarer Glasses
posts.content: The folding Wayfarer glasses make it remarkably easy to store your shades when they’re not being worn. The classic Wayfarer plastic frame features additional hinges at the front and sides that make it possible to fold them up into a compact package.

posts.title: Knife Cutting Finger Protector
posts.content: Keep your precious fingers out of harm’s way when you are slicing and dicing with these knife cutting finger protectors. The finger protector is great while teaching kids how to cook, but will prove to be an invaluable tool for chefs of all ages and skill levels.

posts.title: Light Up Basketball
posts.content: With the light up basketball you’ll be able to continue your b-ball game long after the court lights go off. This regulation size and weight basketball comes with two built in LED lights that illuminate the ball from within and give it a orange-ish red glow.

posts.title: Automatic Pet Ball Launcher
posts.content: Ensure your precious pooch stays happy and healthy by entertaining them using this automatic pet ball launcher. Equipped with multiple safety sensors, it features 9 distance and 6 angle settings so it can launch the ball anywhere between 8-30 feet.

posts.title: Digital Tape Measure
posts.content: Help keep human errors to a minimum during your next home improvement project by utilizing the digital tape measure. This handy tool makes measuring a breeze as it displays accurate readings on its digital screen that can be set to either U.S. or metric units.

posts.title: Polaroid Digital Camera
posts.content: Capture treasured moments and print them out in a snap using the Polaroid digital camera. This compact 10 mega pixel camera features a 3 inch LCD screen for viewing your pictures and is SD compatible so you can increase the memory up to 32 gigs.

posts.title: Gourmet Coffee Subscription Box
posts.content: Enjoy a coffee-house quality cup of Joe from the comfort of home by signing up for this gourmet coffee subscription box. Each month you’ll receive a carefully curated package containing four 1.8 ounce bags of premium coffee from Seattle’s top-rated roasters.

posts.title: Solar Powered Spinning Globe
posts.content: Gain a deeper appreciation for the world we live in by watching its graceful movement on this solar powered spinning globe. An intricately painted globe sits perfectly centered inside a transparent cube that accurately recreates our planet’s rotation.

posts.title: Crystal Himalayan Salt Lamp
posts.content: Improve your bedroom’s air quality with some ambient lighting courtesy of this crystal Himalayan salt lamp. This hand-carved piece stands on a termite-resistant Neem wood base, emits a soft amber glow, and releases negative ions that purify the surrounding air.

posts.title: Spare Tire Organizer
posts.content: Maximize every square inch of your beloved Jeep by storing your gear on this spare tire organizer. Once placed securely over the tire, it provides you with ample storage space – including a large center compartment and four smaller ones along the sides.

posts.title: Cooking With Coolio Cookbook
posts.content: Turn every meal into a ghetto-fabulous culinary experience by preparing them with the “Cooking With Coolio” cookbook. You’ll go from novice to kitchen pimp in no time at all as you learn to prepare tasty five star meals at one star prices.

posts.title: Syringe Needle Pens
posts.content: These fully functional pens will make you look like you’re writing with an actual syringe! These syringe pens are a great gift for doctors and nurses in the medical field, and are also a great gift to give to someone who is deadly afraid of needles!
